description: Retrieves the details about a specific task run as part of a maintenance window execution.

parameters.name: WindowExecutionId
parameters.description: The ID of the maintenance window execution that includes the task.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the specific task execution in the maintenance window task that should be retrieved.

nested_items.name: WindowExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the maintenance window execution that includes the task.

nested_items.name: TaskExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the specific task execution in the maintenance window task that was retrieved.

nested_items.name: TaskArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the task that ran.

nested_items.name: ServiceRole
nested_items.description: The role that was assumed when running the task.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of task that was run.

nested_items.name: TaskParameters
nested_items.description: The parameters passed to the task when it was run.
Key: string, between 1 and 255 characters.
Value: an array of strings, each between 1 and 255 characters.

nested_items.name: Priority
nested_items.description: The priority of the task.

nested_items.name: MaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The defined maximum number of task executions that could be run in parallel.

nested_items.name: MaxErrors
nested_items.description: The defined maximum number of task execution errors allowed before scheduling of the task execution would have been stopped.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the task.

nested_items.name: StatusDetails
nested_items.description: The details explaining the status. Not available for all status values.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time the task execution started.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time the task execution completed.

nested_items.name: AlarmConfiguration
nested_items.description: The details for the CloudWatch alarm you applied to your maintenance window task.

nested_items.name: IgnorePollAlarmFailure
nested_items.description: When this value is true, your automation or command continues to run in cases where we can't retrieve alarm status information from CloudWatch. In cases where we successfully retrieve an alarm status of OK or INSUFFICIENT_DATA, the automation or command continues to run, regardless of this value. Default is false.

nested_items.name: Alarms
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch alarm specified in the configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: TriggeredAlarms
nested_items.description: The CloudWatch alarms that were invoked by the maintenance window task.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of your CloudWatch alarm.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of your CloudWatch alarm.
